original_text: Only on this condition will we agree with you—that you will become as we are by every male among you being circumcised.
korean_text: 그런즉 이같이 하면 너희에게 허락하리라 만일 너희 중 남자가 다 할례를 받고 우리 같이 되면

sentences.original_text: that you will become as we are
by every male among you being circumcised
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 모든 남자가 할례를 받음으로써
